name: Midline '85
description: Midline ‘85 is an interactive psychological thriller about working as an emergency call-taker in the small town of Midline. You will get over a dozen varied calls from the victims, as well as calls from your colleagues, friends, and even rivals. You will accompany Elena through six months of her work, from the very first day to the story end. What it will be like is completely up to you.
